original_body_lines: Police used water cannons and tear gas to disperse the Inter-University Students’ Federation (IUSF) attached to the Colombo university near the Colombo Museum this afternoon, Pix by Nisal Baduge
Police have fired tear gas and water cannons on Inter-University Students’ Federation (IUSF) protestors who were protesting between Colombo Campus and the Thummulla Junction Pix Nisal baduge
